item.title: New release - 0.2.0
item.description: This version adds functionality to format the output of the TerraformShow method as HTML. This is particularly useful in CI/CD scenarios, as a report to use within a build server such as TeamCity.
item.author: erikvanbrakel

item.title: Initial Release - 0.1.0
item.description: The first prerelease version of Cake.Terraform is available!
item.author: erikvanbrakel
